title: i cant redeem this code
body:
i went got a code validated it then when i put it in it just didnt work


its was a free garen and deadnight skin but it just said it was not valid i put it in how it was shown

replies.body: In general, make sure that you're redeeming a code intended for the region you're playing from.  If that doesn't help, just hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll help you out!
